headline: KKR Completes Acquisition of Metronet through Joint Venture, Accelerating Fiber Expansion Across the U.S.
summary: NEW YORK, July 24, 2025--KKR, a leading global investment firm, today announced the completion of the previously announced acquisition of Metronet, one of the largest and fastest-growing independent fiber-to-the-home providers in the United States, through a joint venture with T-Mobile, a leading telecommunications company with the largest 5G network. The transaction brings together Metronet’s broadband infrastructure, rapidly growing residential and commercial fiber business operations and exis

summary: We came across a bullish thesis on KKR & Co. Inc. on Stock Analysis Compilation’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on KKRz. KKR & Co. headline: KKR Faces EU Probe Into Information Provided in $26 Billion NetCo Acquisition
summary: The European Union opened an investigation into whether KKR supplied the bloc’s merger regulator with false or misleading information.

raw.headline: KKR Faces EU Probe Into Information Provided in $26 Billion NetCo Acquisition

headline: KKR faces EU probe over alleged misleading info in Telecom Italia deal
summary: Investing.com -- The European Commission launched an investigation Thursday into whether U.S. investment firm KKR provided incorrect or misleading information during its €22-billion ($26 billion) acquisition of Telecom Italia (BIT:TLIT)’s fixed-line network.

raw.headline: KKR faces EU probe over alleged misleading info in Telecom Italia deal
raw.summary: Investing.com -- The European Commission launched an investigation Thursday into whether U.S. investment firm KKR provided incorrect or misleading information during its €22-billion ($26 billion) acquisition of Telecom Italia (BIT:TLIT)’s fixed-line network.
